alert.note: Alert for Murray (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 5:15PM EDT until June 02 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Murray County in northwestern Georgia... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 515 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sumac, or near Chatsworth, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chatsworth, Eton, Crandall, Conasauga Lake, Sumac, Ramhurst and Fort Mountain State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
